name: dice
content:
dice noun [C]
(GAME)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 (US also or old use die) a small cube (= object with six equal square sides) with a different number of spots on each side, used in games involving chance: We need two dice to play the game.roll/throw the dice You roll/throw the dice and whoever gets the highest score goes first.
hammerstron/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] any game involving chance in which dice are thrown: Let's play dice.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was prepared to risk everything on a last throw of the dice.Roman soldiers often passed the time playing board games, with dice and counters like these ones.
